author: taylor
msg: * The servlet mapping name of the JetspeedContainerServlet no longer hard-coded.
It is configured via jetspeed.properties and defaults to "/container "
* enhanced PortalContext to get default property values

author: weaver
msg: Now supports smart decorators and decorator folders.  Smart
decorators are single template as opposed to a -top and a -bottom.

author: weaver
msg: now uses the new layout template location

author: weaver
msg: Changed TLS configuration to only look at WEB-INF/templates.
Since we can use standard servlet dispatching for both Velocity
and JSP there is no real real to segregate the template folders

author: weaver
msg: VIEW_PAGE should now only define the folder to use for LayoutPortlets
